tagline: My Github hosted blog like stuff.
body:
### Testing django-south auto generated migrations.

In this post I share some caveats I've learned in the process of testing south auto generated migrations for Django apps. **Comming soon.**

### Foodman

A Django webapp to solve the eternal problem of choosing someone to manage the Food Issue. [Code here.](http://github.com/catalanojuan/foodman)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
